articles.title: Ceasefire between Israel and Iran appears to hold as Trump vents frustration with both sides
articles.description: A fragile ceasefire between Iran and Israel seemed to be holding, though President Trump expressed frustration with both nations for their prolonged conflict. Early US intelligence suggests that US strikes may have only set back Iran's nuclear program by months.

articles.title: Zohran Mamdani declares victory in NYC's Democratic mayoral primary as Cuomo concedes
articles.description: Zohran Mamdani has declared victory in New York City's Democratic mayoral primary, with Andrew Cuomo conceding the race. This development comes as the city experiences extreme heat, with temperatures reaching 100 degrees.

articles.title: Israeli army says seven soldiers killed in Gaza
articles.description: The Israeli army reported that seven soldiers were killed in Gaza. Meanwhile, Vietnam is set to remove the death penalty for embezzlement, potentially sparing a tycoon's life. In other news, the UK plans to purchase weapon-capable aircraft under NATO.
